org.apache.flink.runtime.akka

类 QuarantineMonitor

  • java.lang.Object
    • akka.actor.UntypedActor
      • org.apache.flink.runtime.akka.QuarantineMonitor
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    akka.actor.Actor

    public class QuarantineMonitor
extends akka.actor.UntypedActor
    The quarantine monitor subscribes to the event bus of the actor system in which it was started. It listens to AssociationErrorEvent which contain information if we got quarantined or quarantine another remote actor system. If the actor detects that the actor system has been quarantined or quarantined another system, then the QuarantineHandler is called.

    IMPORTANT: The implementation if highly specific for Akka 2.3.7. With different version the quarantine state might be detected differently.
